biotools.summary: Chemo-structural diversity of anti-obesity compound database. AOCD delivers a comprehensive resource on botanicals isolated from plant source(s) and its classification. It also includes compounds derived from Marine seaweeds; Microbial source that are found to have potent source of inhibition targeting obesity.
